titleInfo.title: Skyward: man's mastery of the air as shown by the brilliant flights of America's leading air explorer. His life, his thrilling adventures, his North Pole and trans-Atlantic flights, togethers with is plans for conquering the Antarctic by air.

mods.note: No. 77 of author's autographed limited edition of 500 copies including a piece of cloth from the wings of his plane; Autographed by author
Rockefeller Family Office, Office of JDR, Jr., Personal Library; Bookplate: Ex Libris Abby Aldrich Rockefeller and John D. Rockefeller, Jr.
